scripts.dev: pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:generate && turbo build --filter=@pagent/db --filter=@pagent/shared --filter=@pagent/providers --filter=@pagent/core && turbo dev --filter=@pagent/api --filter=@pagent/worker --filter=@pagent/web
scripts.dev:apps: pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:generate && turbo build --filter=@pagent/db --filter=@pagent/shared --filter=@pagent/providers --filter=@pagent/core && turbo dev --filter=@pagent/api --filter=@pagent/worker --filter=@pagent/web
scripts.db:generate: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env; set +a; cd packages/db && ./node_modules/.bin/prisma generate'
scripts.db:migrate: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env; set +a; cd packages/db && ./node_modules/.bin/prisma migrate deploy'
